charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to Count I (one) and receives: Fifty-seven (57) months of incarceration. Supervised Release: Three (3) years with special conditions that (a) deft. is not to possess a firearm and (b) pursuant to 18:3583(d), the deft. is to be delivered to the INS for deportation and is to be deported by the INS and the deft. may not re-enter the U.S. illegally. Special Assessment: $50.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1); 841(b)(1)(B)(i); 18:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (2)

charges.charge_disposition: By Government's motion in open court on May 20, 1994, Count two (2) is dismissed. (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:952(a) and 960-DEFENDANT DID KNOWINGLY, INTENTIONALLY AND UNLAWFULLY IMPORT INTO THE UNITED STATES FROM A PLACE OUTSIDE A SUBSTANCE CONTAINING HEOIN, SCHEDULE I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. [1:93-m-2289]
